name: PIMCO Low Duration Monthly Income Fund (Canada)
longDescription: PIMCO Low Duration Monthly Income Fund Canada has a primary portfolio of fixedincome securities across a global opportunity set duration varies from 0 to 3 years. The fund primary investment objective is to maximize current income. long term capital appreciation is a secondary objective. Designed for investors who need steady income with low interest rate exposure the fund takes a broad based approach to investing in incomegenerating bonds. While generating attractive current income is a primary goal the fund also seeks longterm capital appreciation and compelling riskadjusted returns with a low duration level. The fund also aims to preserve capital maintain quality and lower interest rate risk. The Fund invests primarily in a diversified portfolio of non-Canadian dollar fixed income instruments of varying maturities while limiting exposure tochanges in interest rates.

fullAddress: 199 Bay Street, Suite 2050, Toronto, ON, CA
